SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
What language are these people speaking?
It's not one I've heard before.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Sinoso noyno kotowa noko gac?
Kowo soyo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Not quite sure what to do here, actually.
Don't seem like they mean us any harm,
but if we can't communicate with 'em,
we ain't ever gonna find us a triangle.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Our apologies. Are you able
to understand us now?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_060.text: Oh, you can speak our language! That's a relief.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Be welcome in this land,
Soyays the Pollinators,
for we have summoned you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_080.text:
Might wanna pack that relief away, hon;
while we're able to understand your
individual words, we ain't got a dang
clue what they actually mean.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_090.text:
By the power of the god of the Imeru,
we have summoned you, the 40,846th
Soyays the Pollinators, to guide the
Epuyke's maiden. Never before has the Soyay been
a group of two, but clearly this
is the will of our god.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_091.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_091.text:
By the power of the god of we Imeru,
we have summoned you, the Soyays the
Pollinators, to guide the Epuyke's maiden. Never before has the Soyay been
a group of two, but clearly this
is the will of our god.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Sorry, but we're just here to look for
a triangle—we don't know anything
about this 'Epuyke' thing.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_110.text:
The Epuyke is the blossom which gives life
to all that is in this world—and the maiden
is she who keeps the Epuyke alive. If the Epuyke does not blossom, all life
will wither and fade. To prevent this fate,
the maiden must cause it to bloom.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_120.text:
And it is the two of you—the Soyays—
who must guide the Epuyke's maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_130.text:
Like she said, we're just lookin' for
a triangle. We ain't really interested
in y'all's personal business.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_140.text:
All is as the god of the Imeru wills it.
This is part of the original promise made
between the god of the Imeru and Ancikar—
the evil which slumbers in the earth. But this is not something you need understand.
All that is asked of you is to guide the
Epuyke's maiden. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_150.text: Hey! You ain't listenin' to us!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_161.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_161.text:
Can't believe they moseyed off when
we haven't even said if we'd accept this
job'a theirs or not. Heck, they're harder
to communicate with than Quissy Stodia!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_170.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_170.text:
I hear what you're saying, but
I just don't feel right leaving the
maiden to fend for herself. Also, it's entirely possible that this
Epuyke rite has something to do with
our wayward triangle.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_180.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_180.text:
All of that to say, I think it's best
for us to go meet the maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_190.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_190.text:
Reckon I can't argue with none'a that,
but I still feel like the pair of us are
playin' right into their hands.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome! Welcome to Dura Village,
Soyays the Pollinators! We have been eagerly
awaiting your arrival. Please, come this way.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Feels like we got eyes
on us from all corners.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_011.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_011.text:
Yes, it certainly does. Soyays must be
very important to the people here.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
I am Lela, the Epuyke's maiden
for this season. I have been waiting for a Soyay to accompany
me through my trials, for it is said that
when maiden and Soyay overcome such together,
the Epuyke will endure.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Trials, eh? Well, if it's a test of physical
endurance, you got the right set'a gals.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
The Epuyke ritual for the previous season has
already ended, and what time remains is short.
I apologize for having you set out so soon
after your arrival, but you must leave now.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_080.text:
Lela's mother—and I am delighted beyond
words that a maiden of Epuyke has been
chosen from my bloodline. Once Lela blooms into the Epuyke flower,
our family will at last be secure.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm going to assume you mean
that in a figurative way.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
No, it is quite literal: to bloom into a flower
is the reward of all Epuyke maidens.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
I'm startin' to get a dang headache...
So apparently it's normal for folks here
to up and turn into flowers?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_120.text:
Normal? Goodness, no! To become the Epuyke
is an indescribable honor that my family—
my daughter—has been chosen for.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_130.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_130.text:
You come from a different world, Soyays, so I
know this must all seem quite strange to you.
But the Epuyke will blossom soon, and I trust
you will understand when you see it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_140.text:
Go forth now, Soyays, and cultivate
my daughter into a beautiful Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_141.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_141.text:
I'm fine doin' the trials with this gal,
but I got no idea how we're supposed to
'guide' or 'cultivate' her when we don't
even know what the heck an Epuyke is.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_150.text:
That makes two of us. Still, this world has
clearly been doing this ritual for a very
long time—and if the previous Soyays could
handle the task, I'm sure we can as well.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_160.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_160.text:
Correct. Now please, we must depart.
There is no time for idle chatter.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_170.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_170.text:
May all luck be with you, Lela.
Go forth proudly for the sake
of our family and our lineage.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_180.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_100_CUT_000_180.text: We'll do our best to help.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I look forward to traveling with you
and completing the trials, Soyays.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Same. But before we set out, have you
ever seen a triangle like this before?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_020.text:
I have not. In our world, we have only
the god of the Imeru, the god of the Kikir,
and the wicked god Ancikar. Does this have anything to do
with our trials, perchance?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_030.text:
I sure hope so! Heck, that's the reason
we came to this world in the first place.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_040.text:
We're hoping that serving as your Soyays will
lead us to unravel the mysteries of this object
we're seeking. So if you think of anything that
might help, please let us know.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_050.text:
I tried to picture what my Soyay—er,
or Soyays—might be like after I was
chosen to be the maiden, but you are far,
far different from anything I imagined. That said, I do not feel nervous.
It is all simply...strange.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_060.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_060.text:
However, if the object you are searching
for happens to be Ancikar, it might prevent
me from blossoming into the Epuyke.
This would be a very sad thing indeed.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_070.text: So lemme ask you somethin': do you actually want to turn into a darn flower? I mean, wouldn't that just... You know? Kill ya?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_080.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_080.text:
The souls of all maidens who bloom into the
Epuyke live forever in the Maiden's Garden,
which is said to be a place of great joy. But I care not what sort of place
it might be; I care only that I will
finally see my Ahpe there again.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_100.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_100.text:
Ahpe is my only friend—one who is
undergoing preparations to bloom
into the Epuyke as we speak. The people claim she will no longer be Ahpe once
she becomes the Epuyke, but I do not believe this.
Ahpe will always be Ahpe—and when she blooms,
her soul will live on in the Maiden's Garden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_110.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_110.text:
I have been alone since she left, and...
I miss her. So please guide me well,
that I might bloom into the Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_000_120.text: We'll certainly do what we can.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_020_000.text:
Dreams of Ancikar—the evil who
slumbers deep within the earth—
have influenced this fiend.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_020_010.text:
Ancikar's dreams appear as fiends
during times of flood, but in times of
drought they appear as eggs instead. While we could easily crush the eggs,
none among us bother to do so,
for it is far simpler to just not travel
during times of flood.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_020_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_020_020.text:
Ancikar's fiends play an
important role, you see.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_000.text:
What's that giant plant that just popped
out of the ground!? Is it a fiend!?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_010.text:
That is the Epuyke, the great blossom
that brings our worlds together. And...it is also Ahpe. My friend.
She has been reborn as the Epuyke,
and will become a bloom of great beauty.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_020.text:
So that's the Epuyke... Er, sorry.
I mean, so that's Ahpe.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_021.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_021.text:
Okay, but why'd it just come
tearin' outta the dirt like that?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_030.text:
That is the job of Ancikar's fiends.
When a fiend dies, Ancikar's dreams—
which birthed said fiends—are absorbed
by the Epuyke. The Epuyke then takes Ancikar's dreams,
converts them to nutrients, and grows.
In this way are we kept safe from Ancikar.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_040.text:
So the more fiends we tussle with,
the better it is for everybody?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_050.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_050.text:
Yes. But if Ahpe's Epuyke grows too fast,
I will not be ready—for I must complete
my trials before it blossoms for Ahpe.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_060.text:
So if I understand this, we must proceed through
your trials while also making the Epuyke grow
at the same time. This all feels like some kind
of strange game...

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_061.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_061.text:
Yeah, but we won't get any do-overs,
which means we need to use our heads
and approach this thing real careful-like.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_070.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_070.text:
To think one would find the role of Soyay
so interesting! The two of you are indeed
far different than I imagined.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_080.text:
Oh, I always try to enjoy everything in life.
But don't worry—I understand how serious
you are about this, and I promise we will
treat it with equal gravity.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_090.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DORA_110_CUT_030_090.text:
Worry not—each Soyay has their own way
of thinking and doing. I ask only that
you guide me true along my trials.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
Welcome, Lela, maiden of the Epuyke.
And you as well, Soyays the Pollinators.
I am the witness for the Trial of Strength.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
Have you come to understand the Epuyke's
maiden a little better now, Soyays?
Are you ready to fulfill your role?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
There's a lot I still don't know
about Lela, so sure. Bring it on.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
It is rare for a Soyay to be so flippant about
their role. Still, in addition to understanding
the maiden, you must also have the strength
to fulfill your role. Show that to me now.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
When your heart is truly close to the
Epuyke's maiden, only then will you
display your true strength as Soyays.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
You speak of the present Epuyke,
who I hear was once your friend.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
My apologies. I meant no offense. Ahpe's Soyay brilliantly overcame all
trials, which is why she bloomed into such
a healthy Epuyke. I only pray your Soyays
perform so admirably, Lela.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
So what does this
trial involve, exactly?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.text: You must locate a fiend and kill it— but a fiend that is not one of Ancikar's. You must find the fiend, Soyays. This is a part of your trial.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.text:
Never have I seen a Soyay so arrogant!
But go then, Soyays the Pollinators,
and guide well our maiden of Epuyke.
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Is this truly the place, Soyays?
I see nothing here.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Huh. Yeah, that's strange.
There should definitely be a fiend here.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
I am the summoner of the strength fiends—
and I am surprised the three of you
discovered me so quickly.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
If I may ask a question, Summoner?
I understand why the Soyays must fight,
but what meaning does the act hold
for a maiden like myself?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Once you witness the Soyays fighting,
you will understand in due course.
Do you stand ready, Soyays?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Then I shall summon the fiend.
O great god of the Kikir, bring us
a mighty fiend from a world beyond!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Well, we found the fiend and defeated it.
That's one trial knocked out the park.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
And yet the Epuyke shows no sign
of growing. What's going on there?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
This fiend was not born from Ancikar's dreams,
but summoned by the god of the Kikir from a world
beyond—summoned with the same power the god
of the Imeru uses to call Soyay the Pollinator.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
We Kikir use this power to fight Ancikar's
dream creatures, and have lost warriors
beyond counting in our battle for this land.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
You have displayed the strength needed to draw
close to the Epuyke's maiden's heart, Soyays.
But tell me, Lela: what did you feel when you
witnessed them in battle?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
At first, I was afraid, my thoughts
dominated by what might happen to me
if the Soyays were to fail.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
But as I watched their desperate battle,
I found myself wishing for their victory—
not for my own sake, but because I simply
wanted to see them win. And when they finally proved victorious,
my heart overflowed with joy.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
I have been alone ever since Ahpe became
the Epuyke. But now, I am not; I can
walk forward proudly beside the Soyays.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Hear me, Lela, Maiden of the Epuyke:
I hereby deem you worthy to proceed
to the Trial of Love. I pray you will become our Epuyke,
and ask your Soyays to guide you well.
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Lela, maiden of the Epuyke!
Hail, Soyays the Pollinators!
I stand ready to bear witness
to the Trial of Love.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_010.text:
We Kikir, fellow residents of this world,
offer the Trial of Love to judge if you are
worthy to become the next season's Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, I can't wait to hear
what this one's all about.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_030.text:
You must plant vine seeds within
the holes upon the plateau.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Small fiends of Ancikar may appear.
Defeat them to fertilize the seeds.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_050.text:
If the maiden holds true love in her heart,
the seeds will immediately germinate
and grow into mighty vines.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_060.text:
And if they do not? Does this mean
I lack love and am not an appropriate
choice for the Epuyke's maiden?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Witness_of_Love

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_080.text:
Let's give it a go and see what happens.
If the Epuyke doesn't do its thing,
we can consider other options.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_090.text:
While I leave the decision of where to plant
the seeds to you, bear in mind these vines
will help our people move from place to place.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_100.text:
How fine it will be to move between
plateaus without encountering fiends
during times of flood!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_130.text:
Say, what do those words mean, anyway?
I've been wondering for a while now.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_140.text:
You need not strain your
mental faculties, Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_150.text:
We said, 'May the Epuyke blossom
be protected.'

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_160.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_100_CUT_000_160.text:
Again, I pray for your success in
this trial. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a hole ripe for seeds.
Want to plant them here?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_000_010.text: Let us plant the seeds here.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_000_030.text:
Sure thing. You just let us know
when you find a place you like.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_010.text:
Is my heart truly loving enough?
What if I fail?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_020.text:
Once, in a country outside this world, I heard
someone say that words have a special power—
and that just by saying something, you can
spark that thought into existence. So here. Take these seeds, then just say
'I have love in my heart' over and over
before you plant them.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_030.text: All right. I will do so.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_040.text:
Well, if Lela handles the seeds,
that just leaves the fertilizer.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_010_050.text:
That witness said small fiends of Ancikar
were going to appear here, right?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_020_000.text:
That's one load of fertilizer delivered!
Er, as it were. Anyway, now we just
need to wait for them to sprout.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_030_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_030_000.text: They sprouted! We did it, Lela!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_030_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_030_010.text:
The love in my heart was recognized after all!
Oh, but that's just wonderful, Soyays.
Er, and if you don't mind my asking,
do the two of you have actual names?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_030_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_110_CUT_030_020.text:
Of course we do. I'm Formina Franklyn,
and my partner here is Bonnie Blair.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Lela, maiden of the Epuyke!
Hail, Soyays the Pollinators!
I stand ready to bear witness
to the Trial of Wisdom.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_010.text:
In this trial, you must collect fragments of
the Epuyke Tablet which have been scattered
across the land, put them back together,
and decipher the tale written upon it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Both tablet and tale are said to have been
created for the Epuyke's maiden by the god
of the Imeru—and to be the physical form
of Ancikar's dreams.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_030.text:
The maiden, upon blooming into the Epuyke,
is no longer a person. She becomes more
akin to a god—to a part of this earth. This trial is a test to see if
you possess the wisdom needed
to become a part of the earth.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Ahpe—I mean, the current Epuyke
collected these fragments as well,
did she not?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ah, but she did more than simply collect
the fragments—she assembled the tablet,
deciphered the tale, and bloomed into
the Epuyke without being led astray. You have little time left,
Maiden Lela. Use it well.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Do you have any advice when it comes to
finding these pieces? Even just knowing
how many we're looking for would help.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_070.text:
These are answers you know well, Soyays.
Now go lead the maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_080.text:
Sounds like finding the answers to those
questions is all part of the trial.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_100_CUT_000_000.text:
This must be a fragment of the Epuyke Tablet.
There is something carved into it—writing,
perhaps? I fear I'll not be able to decipher
this even when fully assembled...

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Let's at least try to find a few more before
we throw in the towel. I mean, you can never
tell how a jigsaw puzzle is supposed to look
when you only have one piece of it, right?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes, I suppose you're right. Regardless,
it's probably best to save such worries
until we have the tablet fully assembled.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_100_CUT_000_030.text:
I'm just looking forward
to learning what it says.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a fragment of
the Epuyke Tablet.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Is a new tablet created every
time this ritual repeats itself?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_020.text:
I am not certain; this is my first time
seeing them for myself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_030.text:
Really? You've never seen the
tablets of a previous Epuyke?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_110_CUT_000_040.text:
Never. And now that I think on it,
I have never met another who has,
either. I wonder why that is.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_120_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a fragment of
the Epuyke Tablet.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_120_CUT_000_020.text:
It feels the same as the
husks of our birth seeds.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_130_CUT_000_000.text: We have all the fragments now.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_130_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_130_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm so curious about what's written on it.
Maybe it's about the mindset required
by an Epuyke? Or even the history of
this world? Something like that?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_130_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_130_CUT_000_020.text:
Ahpe read the tablet and became the Epuyke,
so the actual meaning matters very little.
I merely need to read it and bloom into
the Epuyke, as she did.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_130_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_130_CUT_000_030.text:
Let us return to the Witness to Wisdom
and assemble this as best we can.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_000_000.text:
Maiden Lela, you have collected
all the Epuyke Tablet fragments.
Now put them together, if you can.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_010.text:
Thus marks the end of the Trial of Wisdom.
Whether you choose to speak of the message
written on the tablet or keep it to yourself
is a decision made at your discretion.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_020.text:
How strange... I do not know this writing, 
but when I put it together, I can read it. 
I believe I am closer to the Epuyke now.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_030.text: Hey, don't mind us. Read away.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_000.text:
Oh, but this is impossible! I am not meant
to be the Epuyke's maiden! I will never see
my beloved Ahpe again! I will be alone until
my foliage withers and—

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_010.text:
There have been other maidens who have been
unable to overcome every trial, Lela—but you
must not give up. All is according to the will
of the Imeru's god, after all.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_020.text: Yeah, c'mon! We're rooting for you!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_060.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_060.text:
So be it, Lela, Maiden of the Epuyke.
So be it, Soyays the Pollinators.
All I can do now is pray you safely
finish the ritual. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_000.text:
I did it! I read it!
Now I can finally meet Ahpe!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_010.text:
Nice to see you so happy.
What did it say?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_020.text:
It was from Ahpe—she's waiting for me at the
Maiden's Garden! She even wrote about a secret
only she and I know, so it HAS to be from her! Oh, but I am so happy! I'm going to bloom
into a beautiful Epuyke and see her again!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_030.text:
I'm so happy for you, Lela. You put the
hard work into this trial, and now you're
reaping the rewards of that effort.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_050.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_050.text:
With its role fulfilled, the tablet crumbles
to dust so none but the maiden might know
its tale. Such is the will of the Imeru's god.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_060.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_060.text:
Hear me, Lela, Maiden of the Epuyke!
Hear me, Soyays the Pollinators!
I pray that you might safely finish
the Epuyke ritual. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_030_020.text:
It detailed all that has come to pass,
and all that is yet to come. Indeed,
I feel it is some manner of prophecy. But I also fear it might come across
in a negative way were I to speak of it,
so I think it best that I keep the
details to myself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_030_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_110_CUT_030_030.text:
If that's your wish, we'll respect it.
...But I'm SOOO curious!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_000.text:
At last you have come, Lela,
next Maiden of the Epuyke. This season's Epuyke blossomed full and
beautiful. It absorbed the dreams of the
evil god Ancikar who slumbers underground,
then brilliantly returned to the earth.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_010.text:
We wish for you to bloom
just as beautifully.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_020.text: So Ahpe did it. She became the Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ahpe! It's me, Lela!
Can you see me!?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_040.text:
That is but the Epuyke, Lela.
The one who was called Ahpe is no more.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ignore them, Lela. You were chosen by the
god of the Imeru to be the maiden—there
are things you can see that they can't.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_060.text:
I suggest you choose your words
more carefully, Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh. Hey, sorry I hurt your feelings,
Lela—but I'm not wrong.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_080.text: I'm all right. Thank you, Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_090.text:
We are beginning the Epuyke festival.
The Epuyke's pollen will now rain down
upon the earth, and we grant you special
permission to acquire it for yourself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Now go, before the Kikir
collect it all.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_100_CUT_000_000.text:
The Epuyke bloomed again this season!
We're getting our pollen!

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You talk like it just popped out
of the ground all on its own.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Kikiris2
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_100_CUT_000_020.text:
What, would you rather we talk
like we grew it ourselves?

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_000.text:
Another season, another successful
Epuyke festival.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_020.text:
They've forgotten all about
the role of the maidens...

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_030.text:
I only hope I can get through
this without issue.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_000.text:
The Epuyke's pollen! Hooray!
We get our nutrients from this!

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kikiris2
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_010.text:
So tasty! Epuyke forever!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_020.text:
I wonder if the evil deity Ancikar
truly does slumber underground.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Yes, I suppose the only ones who know for
certain are those in the Maiden's Garden.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_000.text:
Eee hee hee! Festival time!
Epuyke pollen time!

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kikiris2
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_010.text:
The Kikir LOVE Epuyke pollen!
Yummy yummy!

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_020.text:
Is it really that yummy?
I wonder what it tastes like.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_030.text:
That's for the best. Though its form may have
changed, this pollen was once the dreams of
evil Ancikar. If ingested you will become unable
to live without it, just like these Kikir.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_140_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_140_CUT_000_020.text: Yes, I am in the middle of my trials.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_140_CUT_000_030.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_140_CUT_000_030.text:
Please bloom into a beautiful Epuyke
and feed us more delicious pollen.

SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_150_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kikiris2
SUB_W11_GIMK_BOFO_POLLEN_150_CUT_000_010.text:
Yummy, yummy! Such full tummy!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_010.text:
There is little pollen left on the Epuyke.
All that remains is for it to wither,
decay, and become one with the earth.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_020.text: The Epuyke has little time remaining.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_030.text:
This means the ritual for the maiden
to bloom into the next Epuyke will
begin very soon.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_040.text:
We pray you might safely complete your
trials and blossom into an Epuyke that
rivals the one of this season.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_050.text:
Needless to say, I will do
all within my power.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_060.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_060.text:
You show promise, Maiden.
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Maiden Lela!
Hail, Soyays the Pollinators!
The time for the ritual has come.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_010.text:
The Epuyke has bloomed and withered.
Its soul has returned to the earth,
and now watches over and protects us.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_020.text:
And since the Epuyke absorbed Ancikar's
fell magic before it returned to the earth,
we now enjoy this brief moment of peace.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, this is naught but a junction.
Maiden, the time has come for you
to be reborn anew into the Epuyke.
The time has come for the ritual.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Formina! Bonnie! I'm going to
be able to meet Ahpe, right?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Of course. Don't worry about a thing—
we'll be right here watching you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_090.text:
The maiden has been reborn
as the Epuyke's seed.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_110.text:
This is your final task, Soyays the Pollinators:
you must plant the Epuyke's seed in the earth.
Send it to Ancikar, that it might trap the wicked
god in slumber. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_000.text:
It feels like so long ago that we
planted those vine seeds with Lela.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_001.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_001.text: Yeah, but I never thought we'd actually be plantin' her. Is this some test of love for us, then? 'Cause the thought of plantin' her and havin' her not bloom is pretty scary.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_002.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_002.text:
Don't worry, Bonnie. I'm sure she's
going to become a beautiful flower.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_020.text:
You have borne witness to the Imeru's Epuyke
festival as the 40,846th Soyays the Pollinators.
I now pronounce you freed from your duty.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Thanks, but would it be all right 
if we stayed here until Lela...
Until the Epuyke blooms?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_040.text:
Half the Soyays remain to watch the Epuyke
bloom, while the other half run away as
if for their very lives. I see now which
manner of Soyays you are.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Lela's wish was to bloom and then go to the
Maiden's Garden. So while our Soyay duty may
be over, I don't consider the work complete.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_060.text:
And yet, you are now merely two women.
We cannot stand here speaking to you,
for we must be off to greet the 40,847th
Soyay the Pollinator.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_070.text: You're thinking about the next ritual already? Shoot, you folks are more restless than a long-tailed cat in a room full'a rockers.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_080.text:
You are no longer the Soyays.
Such matters do not concern you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_100.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_100.text:
Epuyke nogonoa kowo to you,
the 40,846th Soyays the Pollinators!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_000.text:
Are you in there, Lela!? Can you hear us?
Your flowers are SO beautiful.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_040.text:
The most. I only wish there was
a way to show you how much.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_060.text: Did you meet up with Ahpe, darlin'?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_080.text: Looks like she can't hear us anymore.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_090.text:
Gal must've gone to the Maiden's Garden.
Aw, I'm so dang happy for her.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_END_POLLEN_100_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_END_POLLEN_100_CUT_000.text:
Reckon this means she wants to ride along
on our journey. I think we oughta take it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Hello. My name is Formina Franklyn
and this is Bonnie Blair.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Hey now, ain't nobody summoned us here!
We came of our own free will looking
for a darn triangle!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_050.text:
Pardon us. It seems none of what
we said got through to you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_060.text: Oh, we cotton to the words just fine. But the story you're tellin' us here don't make a lick of sense.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_080.text:
It's clear they're not interested
in listening to us.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_090.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_090.text:
By the power of the god of we Imeru,
we have summoned you, the 80,136th
Soyays the Pollinators, to guide the
Epuyke's maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_100.text:
Does an Epuyke have something to do
with the triangle we're looking for?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_130.text:
How are we supposed to guide a maiden when
we don't know thing one about this world?
Heck, the last thing she wants is to be thrown
in with a couple'a clueless gals.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_150.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_150.text: Stop tossin' mystery words at us and start explainin 'em already!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_170.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_170.text:
Clearly standing around here isn't going
to do us any good. We'll just have to rely
on that power and see where it takes us.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to Doroso Village,
Soyays the Pollinators.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_020.text:
No. I am Kup, younger sister to this
year's maiden, Chup. My sister—

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Her sister does not WANT to be
the stupid Maiden of the Epuyke,
thank you very much. Look, you're the Soyays, right? How about you
just get me out of here and take me back
to whatever world you came from?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_050.text:
But we must have a maiden, Sister!
Elsewise the land will wither away!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_070.text:
I would love to, Sister—AND I'd do a
much better job than you! But I can't,
because the markings of the Imeru
are already on you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_080.text:
This year's Epuyke is already budding!
If you don't do your part as the maiden,
we're all going to die!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_090.text:
Meh, who cares? If we die, all the
clerics in the city will just say,
'This, too, is fate!' or whatever.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_100.text:
Why are you ALWAYS like this, Chup!?
You run around doing whatever you want,
which means I have to behave like a
good girl because you NEVER do! IT'S NOT FAAAIR! WAAAAAAH!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_110.text:
Easy there, darlin'! You can't be makin'
your little sister cry like this—you gotta
be the mature one here.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_120.text:
Ugh. Fiiine. Whatever. I'll do it.
Sheesh! I just wanted to give her
a bit of a hard time, but then she
started crying and made it weird.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_130.text:
Come on then, Soyays.
Let's go do the trials.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_140.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_140.text:
Okay, Kup, I'm off to do the trials,
but I don't know if it'll go well—and
to be honest, I still had lots of things
I wanted to do in life. Happy now?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_160.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_160.text:
Look, we were told to guide you, but we
don't have a clue how to go about that.
Can you maybe help us out?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_170.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_170.text:
Tradition says the Maiden of the Epuyke must
walk with the Soyay. As she does, she finds her
resolve to become the Epuyke by completing
trials of power, wisdom, and love.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_180.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_180.text: I just KNEW we could count on you!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_190.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_190.text:
Oh, that's something all Imeru know.
Sis is just...special.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_200.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_200.text: Make sure you do her proud, 'Sis.'

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_210.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_210.text:
Uh-uh, lady! No way! My name's Chup,
and you don't get to call me 'Sis!'
...Only Kup can call me that.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_220.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_220.text:
Please, Sis! You have to formally
request the Soyays' help!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_230.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_230.text:
Fine, whatever. Please help me,
O great Soyays.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_000.text:
Man, no matter what argument we're
having, once she busts out the tears
it's my loss. It's always been like that,
ever since we were little.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_010.text:
And now, for some who-knows-why reason,
I'm this season's Maiden of the Epuyke
even though my earnest little sister
would be WAY better at it! Sucks for you guys having to be
the Soyays in my season.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_020.text:
We didn't exactly sign up for this job,
so in a way, we're in the same spot.
I mean, we don't even know what
a Soyay IS.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_030.text: Wait, so I'm the one in trouble here!? Well in that case, I'm glad it's me here instead of my little sister. I mean, not that any of it matters; this Epuyke festival is probably the last one anyway.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_040.text:
But if you fail, your sister'll end up six
feet under along with everyone else!
You can't be wantin' that.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_050.text:
Of course not! But I don't really know the
details; it's the god of the Imeru who picks
the Maiden and Soyay and all that. All I know is that I don't want to make
my sister cry again, so you two better
do your damn job properly!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_060.text:
You got it, darlin'!
Er, so what do we do now?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_061.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_061.text:
Good question. Is there anywhere
in particular you want to go, Chup?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_070.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_070.text:
Ugh, this is just the worst.
You're the Soyays, remember?
It's YOUR job to lead ME. Anyway, the trials. There are three of
them, so please just...do your job.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Welcome, Chup, Maiden of the Epuyke.
And you as well, Soyays the Pollinators.
I am the witness for the Trial of Strength.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Answer me, Maiden! Do you understand
why your Soyays must now face the
Trial of Strength?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, it's because I can't fight—but
I don't get why that means they have to.
I mean, all I have to do here is turn
into the Epuyke, right?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
In order to bloom into the Epuyke, you must
defeat Ancikar's fiends. If the current Epuyke
does not blossom, it means the next maiden
will never take her rightful place.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Which means I'll stay the maiden forever
and never become the Epuyke...which I
wouldn't mind, if we're being honest.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
If the Epuyke does not blossom, we will never
receive its pollen. We Kikir toil day in and day
out so we might receive this gift, and it is the
duty of the maiden and Soyay to make it so!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Okay, that's enough talking.
Let's just get this trial started.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text: You must locate a fiend and kill it— but a fiend that is not one of Ancikar's. You must find the fiend, Soyays. This is a part of your trial.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
That's it? This is gonna be a breeze.
C'mon, Chup, let's knock this out.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Wow, someone's confident.
Hope that's justified.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_1.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_1.text:
And now, Soyays the Pollinators,
guide well the Maiden of the Epuyke!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, we're at a big empty spot.
What do I do now?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text: There should be a fiend here.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text:
I am the summoner of the Fiend of Strength,
and am glad the two of you discovered me.
Now watch as I bring forth the fiend into
this world!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text: Hey. Is this really going to be okay?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text:
Don't worry, we're a lot
stronger than we look.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, Epuyke nogonoa kowo,
I guess?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.text: That's one trial taken care of.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.text:
You have done well in the Trial of Strength,
Maiden, and I pray you might bloom into a
beautiful Epuyke. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.text:
Wait, is that really it?
I mean, uh, Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Chup, maiden of the Epuyke!
Hail, Soyays the Pollinators!
I stand ready to bear witness
to the Trial of Love. Your task is thus: take these
vine seeds and plant them in
the holes upon the plateaus.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Small fiends of Ancikar may appear—defeat them
to fertilize the seeds. If the maiden holds true
love in her heart, the seeds will immediately
germinate and grow into mighty vines.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_020.text:
So we're spreading vine seeds?
What's so romantic about that?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_030.text:
The vines that grow will aid you
and all the people. This is love.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_040.text: Yeaaah, sorry, but I don't really have love in my heart—and I absolutely don't want or need to help 'the people.'

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_060.text:
I just don't need this creep pushing a bunch
of stupid charity work on me when I'm already
busy trying not to make my sister cry!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_070.text:
Take the seeds of the transport vines,
and know I will pray for you to safely
overcome your trial. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_200_CUT_000_080.text:
These people really don't care
what the maiden thinks, do they?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a hole ripe for seeds.
Want to plant them here?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_010_000.text:
Look, let's just throw the seeds on the
ground and let 'em grow on their own.
That's what seeds do.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_010_010.text:
Yeah, we probably shouldn't; these
aren't your common-variety seeds,
I mean, the witness mentioned
having to defeat fiends, right?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_020_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_020_000.text:
The seeds are planted and fertilized.
Now they should hopefully sprout.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_030_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_LOVE_210_CUT_030_000.text:
Am I one of these vines?
Or am I a fiend of Ancikar?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Chup, Maiden of the Epuyke!
Hail, Soyays the Pollinators!
I stand ready to bear witness
to the Trial of Wisdom.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Do you understand what this
trial entails, Maiden?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Um... You're gonna give me a test
to see how smart I am?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Our intelligence is nothing in comparison
to the god of the Imeru. No, the wisdom
asked of you here will determine if you
can reflect upon yourself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_040.text:
I sense confusion in your mien,
so permit me to explain. In this trial, you must collect fragments of
the Epuyke Tablet which have been scattered
across the land, put them back together,
and decipher the tale written upon it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_070.text:
And I can understand the tale
if I'm wise enough?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_080.text:
Precisely so—for only the Epuyke's
maiden can decipher the story.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_090.text:
So where do we find these fragments?
And how many are we looking for?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_100.text:
These are answers you know well, Soyay,
for this is what it means to be you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_130.text:
I always get tongue-tied saying this,
but...Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a fragment of the Epuyke Tablet,
but I have ZERO idea what it says.
...Does that mean I'm stupid?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Maybe you need to gather them all
before you can read them?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Okay, whew! I was worried for
a hot second there. But CAN I put them together, though?
And can I even FIND all the fragments
since my Soyays are so...you?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_030.text:
You really think we're that undependable?
Shoot, we've already found one fragment!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_040.text:
Yeah, I'm sorry. I mean, my sister and I have
special memories of this place, but there's
no way you'd have known that. Honestly, the fact you even found it
probably proves you're decent Soyays.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_050.text:
What kind of memories are
we talkin' about here, hon?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_060.text:
This was a popular place to search for pretty
rocks when we were kids—we used to run
around looking for these big, shiny pieces
of crystal. ...And whenever my sister found one,
I would take it and claim it for myself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_061.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_061.text:
Oh yeah, I know them sorts. I reckon you made 
your sister cry and your parents got sore—all
the usual kid stuff that seems right silly when
you look back at it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_070.text:
Yeah. But I guess that doesn't matter now,
because my memories will all vanish as
soon as I become the Epuyke...

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_200_CUT_000_080.text:
Whoops! Man, listen to me!
Talking like my becoming the
Epuyke is guaranteed to happen.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_010.text:
Is a new tablet created every
time this ritual repeats itself?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_020.text:
I guess so? I mean, you never see them,
and it's not like anyone's come up and
shown me one either.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_030.text:
That valuable, huh? I wonder what they'd
fetch if you put one up for auction?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_040.text:
Wanna take this back with you, then?
Sell it for mad cash?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_050.text:
...KIDDING! Ha ha, your faces! Y'know, I come here by myself sometimes
to take in the view of the Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_060.text:
I've always wondered what it feels like to
turn into the Epuyke, but I never thought
I'd...you know. Find out for myself?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_070.text: How does it feel right now?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_210_CUT_000_080.text:
I'm...not sure. But it's not like I don't feel
anything at all. I do. It's just that whatever
I'm feeling is really hard to explain.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_220_CUT_000_000.text:
And there's an Epuyke Tablet fragment.
They feel the exact same as the husks
of our birth seeds, so I can always tell.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_220_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_220_CUT_000_020.text:
Wait, do you NOT!?
Eeeeeew! Groooss!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_220_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_220_CUT_000_030.text:
...KIDDING! Yes, again.
Don't get all offended. You know, I wish you'd talk more about
yourselves. Like, how you're born and
stuff like that? But I guess we don't
really have that kind of time, huh?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_220_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_220_CUT_000_040.text:
But, um, hey. If I do actually manage
to become the Epuyke, will you...
tell my sister about your world?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_230_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_230_CUT_000_010.text:
I wonder what this tablet is going to say?
That witness mentioned something about
it reflecting yourself, right?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_230_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_230_CUT_000_020.text:
What if it said, 'Ha ha! Just kidding!
You're not the maiden after all!'

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_230_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_TABLET_230_CUT_000_040.text:
Let's just get back and try
to put the pieces together.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_000_000.text:
Maiden Chup, you have collected
all the Epuyke Tablet fragments.
Now put them together, if you can.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_000_030.text:
Epi... Epa...? Uhhh...
Oh, right. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_010_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_010_010.text:
Thus marks the end of the Trial of Wisdom.
Whether you choose to speak of the message
written on the tablet or keep it to yourself
is a decision made at your discretion.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_010_030.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_010_030.text:
Of course. It is a revelation
meant for you alone.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_000.text:
I don't think I can do this...
I wasn't the Epuyke's maiden after all.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_010.text:
There have been other maidens who have been
unable to overcome every trial, Chup—but you
must not give up. All is according to the will
of the Imeru's god, after all.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_020.text:
Aw, man! I thought the maidens could
quit halfway through if they wanted,
but I guess not. Can't believe you're making me go through
this whole thing even though you know
how much I suck at it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_030.text:
You don't suck at it, Chup!
Just take a breath and relax.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_050.text: No, you're right. We should go.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_060.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_060.text:
So be it, Chup, Maiden of the Epuyke.
So be it, Soyay the Pollinator.
All I can do now is pray you safely
finish the ritual. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_020_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_020_020.text:
It was all about my little sister—about how
she's always loved me even though all I've
ever done is cause problems for our family.
...I think I understand now why I was chosen.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_020_050.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_020_050.text:
Hear me, Chup, Maiden of the Epuyke!
Hear me, Soyays the Pollinators!
I pray that you might safely finish
the Epuyke ritual. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_030_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_030_020.text: It's a secret. One just for me.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_030_030.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_WISDOM_210_CUT_030_030.text:
The words of the tablet may remain
forever in your heart if you wish it.
My role is to witness, not to know.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_000.text: Where do we need to go next?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_030.text:
So she has run. Well, it is not as
though this is unprecedented.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_040.text:
If we cannot find the maiden before the
Epuyke withers, we will have no choice
but to graft.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_050.text: And what does that mean, exactly?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_060.text:
Grafting involves choosing a substitute
from the maiden's direct family and
casting the spell on them.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_080.text:
The maiden alone does not face the trials.
Tens of thousands of times have we repeated
the Epuyke ritual, and in that span we have
seen all manner of circumstances.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_100.text:
We will cast the spell on the maiden's
little sister, Kup, and form her in a way
that is as close to Chup as possible.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_120.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_120.text:
I had been hoping the god of the Imeru might
choose Kup to begin with, for I feared exactly
this outcome. But alas, the ways of the divine
are mysterious, even to us.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_121.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_121.text:
Chup has been talking about how
she doesn't want to be the maiden,
so maybe this is for the best?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_130.text:
No it ain't! Also, I don't believe for a second
that Chup ran off. She kept tellin' us how she
didn't wanna make her sister cry, so there
ain't no chance she'd abandon her now!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_140.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_200_CUT_000_140.text:
We can wait only until the Epuyke withers.
If she does not return before then,
Kup must be grafted.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_010.text: Chup hasn't been here, has she?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_040.text:
You must stay here, Kup. We cannot
risk your running off as well.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_050.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_050.text:
I trust you are familiar with the spell
of grafting? We are considering it as
a possible option.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_070.text:
Only in the sense that we don't know where
she is at the moment—but she might've just
gone out for a walk or something.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_080.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_080.text:
No, it's all right. I'll be the maiden
if that's what Sis wants. But...

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_090.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_090.text:
But before I do, I have to talk to her.
Please, Soyays. Find her.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_110.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_210_CUT_000_110.text:
Make haste, Soyays the Pollinators, for
you have only until the Epuyke withers.
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_220_CUT_000_000.text:
Ugh, you found me ALREADY?
Seriously, what even are you?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_220_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_220_CUT_000_010.text:
What's the big idea, girl!?
You got any idea how dang
worried all of us were!?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_220_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_220_CUT_000_020.text:
I just wanted to be alone, okay? I wanted to
think about how I might look as the Epuyke,
and how the whole thing might...feel. And I was really close to an answer,
but then YOU showed up! Ugh!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_220_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_220_CUT_000_030.text:
I hear you, but there's no time for this.
If you don't get back to the settlement,
they're going to graft Kup.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_221_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_221_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sooorry!
Your dumb big sister took a little detour,
and now everybody's lost their damn minds.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_221_CUT_000_020.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_221_CUT_000_020.text:
Should the Epuyke vanish, Ancikar will begin
to awaken. You carry a great burden as the
Maiden of Epuyke, Chup—do you seek to have
this lifted from your shoulders?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_221_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_221_CUT_000_030.text:
Look, I wasn't running away, okay?
I just needed a little alone time. But I'm back now, so just leave
my sister out of this and let
me finish the stupid thing!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_221_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_221_CUT_000_060.text:
I got this, Kup. It's okay.
I'm your big sister, after all.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_000.text:
THERE you are, Chup!
What are you doing here?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh. Hey, Soyay. Sorry for taking off,
but I just had this random thought. So remember how I told you about the
pretty rocks when we came here? Well,
I wanted to find a nice one for Kup.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_020.text:
This ain't the time to be worryin' on some
shiny geegaw, girl! Them fellers are about
to graft your dang sister!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_030.text:
What!? Oh, come on already!
Why doesn't anyone here TRUST me?
I mean, I was CHOSEN, remember!?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_040.text:
We know you love her, darlin', but other folks
maybe ain't got the message yet—so let's scoot
the boot back there while we still can!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_050.text:
But I still haven't found a good rock!
You have to help me look!

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_060.text:
She's clearly not going to leave until
she finds what she's looking for.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_230_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, for the love'a... Fine!
We'll split up and find a rock.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_231_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_231_CUT_000_020.text:
Are you SURE you're good at finding stuff?
Or that you're even really the Soyay?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_231_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_231_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, whoa... This is so pretty...
But isn't it a piece of an Ancikar fiend?

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_231_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_231_CUT_000_040.text:
You shouldn't give two spits WHAT it
is so long as it meets your conditions!
Now let's just take it and get back
to the settlement already.

SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_232_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_BOFO_RUN_232_CUT_000_040.text:
Hey, Kup. So remember how we used to collect
rocks and I'd always take whatever you found?
I know it was a long time ago, but I'm still sorry.
So...I got you this.
